normalized: i can hear a voice from somewhere.
deep, deep in the darkness, a voice far, far away seemsto be calling my name.

name: yuko
normalized: ichiro-kun… ichiro-kun…
dazzling light fills my vision and i completely wake up.
the one who called me from my deep sleep was…

name: ichiro
normalized: yuko-sensei…?
it was yuko-sensei's voice.

name: ichiro
normalized: huh?
my cheek is resting on something velvety smooth.
itfeels so good i reflexively rub my cheek against it.

name: yuko
normalized: fuah!?
nn, fuu, that tickles, ichiro-kun.
my gaze goes upwards towards the voice i heard and…

name: ichiro
normalized: yuko-sensei…
beyond her large breasts, there was yuko-sensei's face.

name: yuko
normalized: were you having a dream?

name: ichiro
normalized: huh?
a dream…?
what was it again?
something had happened.
that's how i felt , but… whatexactly had happened was… as if it was obscured in afog…

name: yuko
normalized: you were being a bit restless, so wasn't it a bad dream?

name: ichiro
normalized: a bad… dream…?
yuko-sensei says so… and that's what it feels like.
but i still can't really remember.

name: ichiro
normalized: i can't remember it at all… i… what was i doing?

name: yuko
normalized: hehehe.
in your dream?
or maybe in reality?

name: ichiro
normalized: umm… in reality…?

name: yuko
normalized: you collapsed during class.
looks like a lightheatstroke.

name: ichiro
normalized: what?
somehow, that really gives me a deja vu feeling…
it's like something like this happened before…

name: ichiro
normalized: k-kuuh!?
a dull pain strikes my head as i try to remember if thesame thing happened before.

name: yuko
normalized: oh my, you don't need to force yourself.

name: ichiro
normalized: y-yeah…
i think there's something that i simply must rememberbut…
the pain in my head and yuko-sensei's gentle voice weregetting in my way.

name: ichiro
normalized: （getting in my way…?
yuko-sensei's voice doesn'tbother me, really…）
yuko-sensei told me it's fine not to force myself.
it'sfine to do as she says.

name: yuko
normalized: now, rest a little bit more.
saying so, she gently strokes my head.

name: ichiro
normalized: yeah…
i decide to do whatever yuko-sensei tells me to.
ishouldn't be thinking about difficult stuff.

name: yuko
normalized: you're a good boy… ichiro-kun…
the smiling yuko-sensei's eyes started to glow with redlight.

name: ichiro
normalized: y-yuko-sensei…!?
i try to get up but――

name: ichiro
normalized: （e-eh…?
my body doesn't move…）
i wasn't able to move in the slightest, like i wasbeing held still by some powerful force.
yuko-sensei continues to stroke my head.

name: ichiro
normalized: yuko… sen… se… i… …
not just my body, now not even my words are coming out.
despite the strange situation, yuko-sensei continues tostroke my head.
there's a bewitching smile on her faceand her red eyes are shining.

name: ichiro
normalized: （w-what's… going… on…）
every stroke of my head causes my mind to become moreand more muddled…
i stop being able to think.

name: yuko
normalized: … ku… nn…
yuko-sensei's mouth opens and she's saying something…

name: ichiro
normalized: （i can't… what is she… saying… i can't…understand… it… …）
already, i'm unable to piece together what she is saying.

name: ichiro
normalized: （it's fine… to entrust everything… to yuko-sensei…）
i resign my thoughts and my resistance vanishes.
itfeels like my entire body is submerged into pleasantlyhot water.

name: yuko
normalized: … hey… ichi… ku… is…
i slowly close my eyes while yuko-sensei gentlycaresses me.
i yield everything to her, like a baby inside a womb.

name: yuko
normalized: now, we'll be experimenting today too…

name: ichiro
normalized: yeah…
i didn't understand what she was saying.
but,yuko-sensei couldn't be wrong.
thinking so, i give a small nod, just a small child would.
